name: tavily-ai-search
description: To retrieve information via the internet or for topics that the LLM does not know about and intense research is needed.

search_query.description: The search query for the Tavily web search.

include_metadata.description: Whether to include URL metadata in the response.

consolidate_results.description: Whether to consolidate multiple results into a single summary.

summary.description: Consolidated summary of all search results
